org.gbif.crawler

Interface CrawlerCoordinatorService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CrawlerCoordinatorServiceImpl

    public interface CrawlerCoordinatorService
    The public interface of the Crawler Coordinator. This allows to schedule a crawl.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initiateCrawl(UUID datasetKey)
      Initiates a crawl of an existing dataset without any explicit priority.
      void initiateCrawl(UUID datasetKey, int priority)
      Initiates a crawl of an existing dataset at a given priority.

    • Method Detail

      • initiateCrawl

        void initiateCrawl(UUID datasetKey,
                 int priority)
        Initiates a crawl of an existing dataset at a given priority.
        Parameters:
        datasetKey - of the dataset to crawl
        priority - of this crawl. Lower numbers mean higher priorities. This priority can be chosen arbitrarily.
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if there are any problems communicating with the Registry or ZooKeeper. ZooKeeper will already have been retried.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the dataset doesn't exist, we don't support its protocol, it isn't eligible for crawling
        AlreadyCrawlingException - if the dataset is already being crawled

      • initiateCrawl

        void initiateCrawl(UUID datasetKey)
        Initiates a crawl of an existing dataset without any explicit priority. Implementations are free to chose a default priority.
        Parameters:
        datasetKey - of the dataset to crawl
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if there are any problems communicating with the Registry or ZooKeeper. ZooKeeper will already have been retried.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the dataset doesn't exist, we don't support its protocol, it isn't eligible for crawling
        AlreadyCrawlingException - if the dataset is already being crawled
